content: crochet cat crown a free crochetyknitter pattern crochetyknitter tumblr com instagram com/thecrochetyknitter thecrochetyknitter etsy com hook size g6 4 00mm or size needed to obtain gauge gauge 4 half_double_crochet x 3 row = 1 yarn any worsted weight yarn i used caron simply soft in the photos stitches used us terms half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet picot stitch chain 3 stitches slip_stitch back into first chain made slip back into the back side of the chain not the v a note on sizing this is sized to fit a kitten s head over both ears or cocked to the side over one ear on an adult cat directions 1 - chain 40 stitches 2 - join to work in round chain 2 half_double_crochet in each stitch until reach end of round slip_stitch into second stitch of your initial chain to join round 40 st 3 - chain 2 half_double_crochet in each stitch until reach end of round slip_stitch into second stitch of your initial chain to join round 40 st 4 - chain 2 half_double_crochet in each stitch until reach end of round slip_stitch into second stitch of your initial chain to join round 40 st 5 chain 2 *skip two stitches 3 double_crochet into next stitch that s the third stitch from the beginning picot stitch 3 double_crochet into the same stitch where you made the first 3 double_crochet slip stitch into two stitches past the stitch where you made all the dcs * repeat from ** to end bind off weave in ends and voila your kitty crown is ready j please share your cute kitty pics on ravelry instagram or tumblr and tag me so i can see
